contents:
Are you the shadow of the last ID I was talking to...

Do some digging, go find out my proposition about eliminating Chinese language. Study Chinese tend to make people think less, it likes a cell to people, because the freedom part were all destroyed.

去看我在劉仲敬那個討論串曾經說了什麼吧，我依然認為這樣才是將來中國人活下來的機會。
